article_title: What Happens To Uber Drivers And Other Sharing Economy Workers Injured On The Job?

article_metadata.author: Ellen Huet

og.description: Omar, a 32-year-old Uber driver, was working a typical late-night shift in Los Angeles last month when his ride veered from pleasant to violent in just a few minutes. When he pulled his SUV full of passengers up to the Hollywood Tower apartments around 2:30 a.m., two of the riders refused to leave his [...]
